_configNotes.quantizations: Each entity has 3 quantization options. To change default, update 'defaultQuantization' field.
_configNotes.f32: Full precision - highest quality, highest memory usage. Recommended for production.
_configNotes.f16: Half precision - high quality, medium memory. Good balance.
_configNotes.q8_0: 8-bit quantized - good quality, low memory. Best for running multiple models simultaneously.
